scripts.redeploy-all-local: yarn codegen && yarn build && docker compose down && docker compose up -d && echo 'Sleeping for 15 seconds' &&  sleep 15 && yarn remove-all-local && yarn create-all-local && yarn deploy-all-local
scripts.deploy-athena-local: graph deploy --version-label=1 --node http://localhost:8020/ VAnchorAthenaLocal --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --network Athena
scripts.deploy-hermes-local: graph deploy --version-label=1  --node http://localhost:8020/ VAnchorHermesLocal --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --network Hermes
scripts.deploy-demeter-local: graph deploy --version-label=1 --node http://localhost:8020/ VAnchorDemeterLocal --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --network Demeter
scripts.remove-all-local: yarn remove-athena-local && yarn remove-hermes-local && yarn remove-demeter-local
scripts.deploy-all-local: yarn deploy-athena-local && yarn deploy-hermes-local && yarn deploy-demeter-local
scripts.create-all-local: yarn create-athena-local && yarn create-hermes-local && yarn create-demeter-local
